name: Suspicious Stop Windows Service
description: Detects the usage of one of the the commands to stop services such as 'net', 'sc'...etc in order to stop critical or important windows services such as AV, Backup...etc. As seen being used in some ransomware scripts
false_positives: Administrator or tools shutting down the services due to upgrade or removal purposes. If you experience some FP please consider adding filters to the parent process launching this command and not removing the entry
query: (process.command_line:(/.*[Vv][Ss][Ss].*/ OR /.*[Hh][Ee][Aa][Ll][Tt][Hh][Tt][Ll][Ss][Ee][Rr][Vv][Ii][Cc][Ee].*/ OR [Ss][Ee][Rr][Vv][Ii][Cc][Ee]\".*/ OR /.*\"[Ss][Oo][Pp][Hh][Oo][Ss]\ [Ss][Yy][Ss][Tt][Ee][Mm]\ [Pp][Rr][Oo][Tt][Ee][Cc][Tt][Ii][Oo][Nn]\ [Ss][Ee][Rr][Vv][Ii][Cc][Ee]\".*/ OR
